original_title: Firehouse: Rock On The Road Live in Japan 1991
overview: Excellent quality Pro-shot broadcast recording of Firehouse, recorded live in Tokyo, Japan in May, 1991 .  DVD has a total running time of 75 minutes.  Quality is about 8/10, and setlist is as follows:  Lover's Lane  Overnight sensation  All She Wrote  Oughta Be A Law  Helpless  Don't Treat Me Bad  Rock on The Radio  Home Is Where The Heart is  Don't Walk Away  Shake & Tumble
title: Firehouse: Rock On The Road Live in Japan 1991
